## TickAllocator.getArray3Number() method

Gets a 3-element number array from the pool. Array is reset to \[0, 0, 0\] and ready for use.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getArray3Number(copyFrom?: Array3Number | Set<number>): Array3Number;
```
